org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria.placement

Class WeightedHardConflicts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.criteria.AbstractCriterion<Lecture,Placement>
      • org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria.TimetablingCriterion
        • org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria.placement.PlacementSelectionCriterion
          • org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria.placement.WeightedHardConflicts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<Lecture,Placement,AbstractCriterion.ValueContext>, Criterion<Lecture,Placement>, ExtendedInfoProvider<Lecture,Placement>, InfoProvider<Lecture,Placement>, ModelListener<Lecture,Placement>, SolutionListener<Lecture,Placement>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PotentialHardConflicts

    public class WeightedHardConflicts
extends PlacementSelectionCriterion
implements SolutionListener<Lecture,Placement>
    Hard conflicts weighted by the conflict-based statistics (past occurrences).
    Version:
    CourseTT 1.3 (University Course Timetabling)
